loggedOut.title: Logged Out
loggedOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.

logoutFailed.title: Logout Failed
logoutFailed.description: Could not log you out. Please try again.

signUpSuccess.title: Account Created & Signed In!
signUpSuccess.description: Welcome to {appName}! You have been successfully signed in.

tooltip.onlinePending: {count} actions pending. Sync will start soon.
tooltip.onlineSynced: You are online. All data is in sync.
tooltip.offline: You are offline. {count, plural, =0 {No changes are pending.} =1 {1 change is pending.} other {{count} changes are pending.}}

offline.title: You are currently offline
offline.description: Changes will be saved locally and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing data...
syncing.description: Sending {count, plural, =1 {1 offline action} other {{count} offline actions}} to the server.

synced.title: Sync complete
synced.description: Your offline changes have been successfully saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline changes. We will try again later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: This action will be completed when you are back online.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the agricultural value chain for a sustainable future.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or recover account with your Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g. Jane Doe or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain...
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No problem. Enter your email address below and we'll send you a reset link.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password below.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Use your network to regain access.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once your friend scans the code to verify your identity, you'll regain access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted contact on DamDoh scan this QR code with the 'Help a Friend Recover' feature in their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and will expire in 10 minutes.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the password reset link.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

resetPassword.successDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.successRedirect: You will be redirected to the sign-in page shortly.

errors.missingCode: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.missingCodeDescription: The password reset link is missing or invalid. Please return to the Forgot Password page to request a new one.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.userNotFound: No user found corresponding to this reset link.
errors.weakPassword: The new password is not strong enough.

searchPage.title: Universal Search
searchPage.description: Find anything across the DamDoh platform, from products and services to people and discussions.
searchPage.placeholder: Search for organic coffee, tractor repair, or a user...

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.searchErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred during the search. Please try again.
modal.invalidCodeError: This does not appear to be a valid DamDoh QR code.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.
modal.noResults: No results found for your query.
modal.tryAgain: Try a different search term or use broader keywords.

Marketplace.title: Marketplace
Marketplace.description: Discover products, services, and talent across the agricultural supply chain.

pinning.unpinnedDescription: The Marketplace has been unpinned from your homepage.
pinning.pinnedDescription: The Marketplace is now your default homepage.

search.title: Search Failed
search.description: There was an error performing the search. Please try again later.

noItemsFound.title: No listings match your search.
noItemsFound.hint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

createListing.title: Create a New Listing
createListing.description: List a product or service to make it available to the DamDoh community.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide details about your product or service...
form.relatedVtiDescription: Link this listing to a VTI batch for enhanced trust.
form.sustainableDescription: This item was produced using sustainable or regenerative practices.

authentication.title: Not Authenticated
authentication.description: You must be logged in to create a listing.

missingInfo.title: Missing Information
missingInfo.description: Please provide a name and description to suggest a price.

failed.title: Price Suggestion Failed
failed.description: Could not generate a price suggestion. Please try again.

creation.title: Listing Creation Failed
creation.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

success.title: Listing Created!
success.description: Your new listing is now live on the marketplace.

createShop.title: Create Your Digital Shopfront
createShop.description: Establish your professional presence on DamDoh to showcase all your products and services in one place.
createShop.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create a shopfront.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe your business, what you offer, and your mission.

toast.failDescription: Could not create your shopfront. Please try again.

notFound.description: This listing could not be found.

coupon.label: Have a coupon code?
coupon.failDescription: The coupon code is not valid for this seller or has expired.

order.title: Place Order for {itemName}
order.description: Confirm the quantity and add any notes for the seller.
order.authDescription: You need to be logged in to place an order.
order.quantityErrorDescription: Please enter a quantity greater than zero.
order.successDescription: Your order has been sent to the seller.
order.failDescription: There was an error placing your order. Please try again.

booking.authDescription: You must be logged in to reserve this service.
booking.dateError: Please select a start and end date for your booking.
booking.successDescription: Your booking request has been sent to the operator.
booking.bookedDescription: Your booking is confirmed. View your ticket for check-in.
booking.modalDescription: Present this QR code for check-in at {itemName}.
booking.modalScan: Operator will scan this QR code for check-in.

bookingsTab.title: Guest Bookings
bookingsTab.description: View and manage all bookings for this service.
bookingsTab.noBookings: There are no bookings for this service yet.

myOrders.title: My Orders & Sales
myOrders.description: Manage orders you've placed and sales you've received.

auth.title: Please Sign In
auth.description: You need to be logged in to view your orders.

toast.fetchError: Could not load your orders. Please try again.
toast.updateSuccess: Order status has been updated to {status}.

myOrders.noOrders: You have not received any orders yet.

promotions.title: My Promotions & Coupons
promotions.description: Create and manage discount codes for your marketplace listings.
promotions.signInPrompt: Please sign in to manage your promotions.

list.title: Existing Coupons
list.description: View and share your active coupons.
list.toastDescription: A shareable link for coupon {link} has been copied to your clipboard.

shareModal.title: Share Coupon
shareModal.description: Share this link with customers to apply the coupon automatically.

list.noCoupons: You have not created any coupons yet.

toast.shareDescription: Coupon link for '{code}' copied to clipboard.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find skilled professionals or offer your agricultural services to the community.
talentExchangePage.searchPlaceholder: Search for services (e.g., agronomy, drone pilot)...
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: There are no services matching your criteria. Try adjusting your search or be the first to offer a service in this category!

error.title: Search Failed
error.description: There was an error fetching services. Please try again.

forumsPage.title: Community Forums
forumsPage.description: Connect, share knowledge, and discuss important topics with peers in the agricultural sector.
forumsPage.noTopics: No topics found. Be the first to create one!

pinning.unpinnedDescription: The Forums page has been unpinned from your homepage.
pinning.pinnedDescription: The Forums page is now your default homepage.

errors.loadDescription: There was a problem fetching the forum topics. Please try again later.

groupsPage.title: Community Groups
groupsPage.description: Join public or private groups to collaborate on specific projects, interests, or regional initiatives.
groupsPage.notFound: No groups found matching your search.

create.title: Create a New Group
create.description: Start a new community group for collaboration.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: What is the purpose of this group?

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: You must be logged in to create a group.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Information
incomplete.description: Please provide a name and description for the group.

success.title: Group Created!
success.description: Your new group has been successfully created.

detail.beTheFirst: Be the first to start a conversation!

postDetail.repliesTitle: {count, plural, =0 {No Replies Yet} =1 {1 Reply} other {{count} Replies}}
postDetail.noReplies: Be the first to reply to this post.

submitError.title: Reply Failed
submitError.description: Could not post your reply. Please try again.

loadPostError.title: Error
loadPostError.description: Could not load the post details.

notFound.title: Post Not Found
notFound.description: The post you are looking for does not exist in this group.

createPost.title: Start a New Discussion
createPost.description: Create a new post to engage with other group members.

form.titlePlaceholder: Enter a clear and concise title
form.contentPlaceholder: Share details, ask questions, or start a discussion...

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: You must be logged in to post.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Post
incomplete.description: Please provide a name and content for your post.

success.title: Post Created!
success.description: Your post has been added to the group discussion.

loadError.title: Error
loadError.description: Could not load groups. Please try again later.

toast.loginToJoin: You must be logged in to join a group.

networkPage.title: My Network
networkPage.description: Discover and connect with stakeholders across the agricultural value chain.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: Based on your profile, here are some people you might want to connect with.
networkPage.loadError: Could not load profiles. Please try again.
networkPage.noSuggestions: No new suggestions at this time. Complete your profile for better recommendations!
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Use the filters to find exactly who you're looking for.
networkPage.noStakeholdersFound: No stakeholders found matching your criteria.
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: Your established professional network on DamDoh.
myNetworkPage.noConnections: You haven't made any connections yet. Start by exploring the network!
myNetworkPage.requestsDescription: Review and respond to pending connection requests.
myNetworkPage.noRequests: You have no pending connection requests.

toast.loadError: Failed to load your network data.

agentToolsPage.title: Field Agent Tools
agentToolsPage.description: Securely look up user information for verification and support.
agentToolsPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the required permissions to access this page.
agentToolsPage.resultsPlaceholder: User details will appear here after a successful search.

traceabilityPage.title: Product Traceability
traceabilityPage.description: Track the journey of agricultural products from farm to table. Enter a Vibrant Traceability ID (VTI) to view a product's full history.
traceabilityPage.vtiDescription: The VTI is a unique code found on VTI-enabled product packaging.
traceabilityPage.recentDescription: Explore some of the newest traceable products on the platform.
traceabilityPage.noRecentBatches: No recently added traceable batches found.

detailPage.loadError: Could not load traceability data for this batch.
detailPage.notFoundDescription: The traceability ID you entered does not match any batch in our system.
detailPage.sustainablyGrownDescription: This product was grown using sustainable inputs logged on the DamDoh platform.
detailPage.journeyDescription: A complete log of events for this batch from farm to you.
detailPage.noEventsFound: No traceability events have been logged for this batch yet.
detailPage.noEventDetails: No further details provided for this event.

welcome.summary: Hello! I'm {appName}'s AI Knowledge assistant, your dedicated partner for all things agriculture! Wondering about sustainable farming, navigating the agri-supply chain, or boosting your farming business? Just ask! I can also guide you through using the DamDoh app's features.
welcome.title: Welcome to DamDoh AI
welcome.imagePrompt: Got a crop concern? Upload a photo and I'll analyze it.
welcome.example1: How do I make Fish Amino Acid?
welcome.example2: What is 'God's Blanket' in Farming God's Way?
welcome.example3: How can I improve my soil health?

aiAssistantPage.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

hub.title: Farm Management Hub
hub.description: Your central dashboard for managing all farm operations, from crop cycles to financials.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: Add and manage your farms, fields, and track individual crop lifecycles.

labor.title: Labor Management
labor.description: Keep track of your workers, log hours, and manage payments.

knf.title: KNF Inputs
knf.description: Create and manage your own Korean Natural Farming inputs.

fgw.title: Farming God's Way
fgw.description: Learn and apply the principles of Farming God's Way.

financials.title: Money Matters
financials.description: Track income, expenses, and get profitability insights.

seedStarting.title: Seed Starting Guide
seedStarting.description: A guide to successfully starting seeds indoors.

familyFarm.title: 200sqm Family Farm
familyFarm.description: Explore the model for a highly productive, integrated small-scale farm.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Track your equipment, tools, and other farm assets.

myFarms.title: My Farms
myFarms.noFarmsDescription: You haven't added any farms yet. Get started by adding your first one.

toast.fetchError: Could not fetch your farms. Please try again.

auth.title: Please Sign In
auth.description: You need to be logged in to manage your farms.

createFarm.title: Add a New Farm
createFarm.description: Fill in the details below to register a new farm on your profile.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create a farm.
toast.successDescription: {farmName} has been successfully added to your profile.

form.locationDescription: Provide a general location, like City/Region and Country.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of your farm's focus or mission.
form.irrigationDescription: Describe the primary water source or methods used.

crops.title: Crops & Fields
crops.description: Manage the crops currently growing on this farm.
crops.noCrops: No crops have been added to this farm yet.

insights.title: Profitability Insights
insights.description: AI-powered insights based on your farm's data.
insights.noInsights: Log more activities to generate insights.

notFound.title: Farm Not Found
notFound.description: We couldn't find the farm you were looking for.

createCrop.title: Add a New Crop
createCrop.description: Log a new crop or field plot to begin tracking its journey.
createCrop.notesPlaceholder: Add any relevant notes about this crop or field.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create a crop.
toast.failDescription: Could not save the new crop. Please try again.

editCrop.title: Edit Crop
editCrop.description: Update the details for this crop or field plot.

toast.loadError: Could not load the crop details to edit.

cropDetailPage.noActivities: No activities have been logged for this crop yet.

eventPayload.noDetails: No further details provided for this event.

logInput.title: Log Input Application
logInput.description: Record the application of fertilizers, pesticides, KNF inputs, or water.
logInput.manualInputPlaceholder: e.g., DAP Fertilizer, Neem Oil, Irrigation Water

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to log an application.
toast.description: Input application has been successfully recorded.

logObservation.title: Log an Observation
logObservation.description: Record observations about crop health, growth, pests, or environmental conditions.
logObservation.detailsPlaceholder: Describe what you observed in detail.
logObservation.uploadDescription: Add a photo for AI diagnosis or visual records.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to log an observation.
toast.aiDescription: Our AI is looking at your photo, this may take a moment.
toast.aiCompleteDescription: Review the analysis in the traceability log.
toast.aiFailDescription: Could not analyze the image. The observation will be saved without AI insights.
toast.successDescription: Your observation has been successfully logged.

logHarvest.title: Log Harvest for {cropType}
logHarvest.description: Record the details of your harvest. This will create a new traceable batch (VTI).
logHarvest.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Harvested from the northern section.

offlineToast.title: Working Offline
offlineToast.description: Harvest log has been saved locally and will be synced to create a VTI when you're back online.

success.title: Harvest Logged!
success.description: A new VTI ({vtiId}) has been created for your batch of {cropType}.
success.successCardDescription: You have successfully logged the harvest for your {cropType} batch. It has been assigned the Verifiable Traceability ID: {vtiId}

editFarm.title: Edit Farm Details
editFarm.description: Update the information for this farm.

toast.loadError: Could not load the farm details to edit.
